com.milk.uberchat.command
Class LocusCommands

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.milk.uberchat.command.LocusCommands
public final class LocusCommands
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains Commands for ChatLocus objects as inner classes and knows how to manage them.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
See Also:
ChatLocus

Nested Class Summary
private  class LocusCommands.MyCommand
          This is the superclass of the commands defined in this class.
private  class LocusCommands.MyLocusListener
          This is the listener that listens to the locus object and tweaks the commands as appropriate.
private  class LocusCommands.Speak
          This is the command associated with the speak() operation.
static class LocusCommands.SpeakArgument
          This is the argument to a Speak.
private  class LocusCommands.UpdateUsers
          This is the command associated with the updateUsers() operation.

Constructor Detail

LocusCommands

public LocusCommands(ChatLocus locus)
Construct a LocusCommands object. Constructing the object automatically causes it to add a listener to the specified locus, but it doesn't actually add any commands (since, as a separate entity, it has no capability to add commands to it).

Parameters:
locus - non-null; the locus to use
Method Detail

getCommands

public Command[] getCommands()
Get the commands that this object manages.

Returns:
an array of commands
